title: The World outdoors: flashing silver
creator_credit: Douglas Sinclair and Douglas Sinclair Productions
brief_description: Looks at sport fishing on Moresby Island - the southern island of the Queen Charlotte Islands off the northern coast of British Columbia. Shows in action Roderick Haig-Brown, author and prominent fly fisherman, who fishes only for sport and releases his catches unharmed.
